/* SelectWtlPipeList 상수관로 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM A LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE F ON A.FTR_CDE = F.FTR_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H ON A.HJD_CDE = H.HJD_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON C.MST_CD = '250101' AND C.DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C2 ON C2.MST_CD = '250026' AND C2.DTL_CD = A.JHT_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C3 ON C3.MST_CD = '250102' AND C3.DTL_CD = A.MOP_CDE
WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE like #MNG_CDE# || '%'
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE like #HJD_CDE# || '%'
upper(A.CNT_NUM ) like '%' || upper(#CNT_NUM# ) || '%'
upper(A.SHT_NUM) like '%' || upper(#SHT_NUM#) || '%'
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.MOP_CDE like #MOP_CDE# || '%'
A.JHT_CDE like #JHT_CDE# || '%'
A.PIP_DIP like #PIP_DIP# || '%'
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE ,F.FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE ,H.HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE ,C.NM AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.SAA_CDE , A.MOP_CDE ,C3.NM AS MOP_NAM , A.JHT_CDE ,C2.NM AS JHT_NAM , A.LOW_DEP , A.HGH_DEP , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.PIP_LBL , A.PIP_DIP /*구경*/ , A.PIP_LEN , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM A LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE F ON A.FTR_CDE = F.FTR_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H ON A.HJD_CDE = H.HJD_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON C.MST_CD = '250101' AND C.DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C2 ON C2.MST_CD = '250026' AND C2.DTL_CD = A.JHT_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C3 ON C3.MST_CD = '250102' AND C3.DTL_CD = A.MOP_CDE
WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE like #MNG_CDE# || '%'
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE like #HJD_CDE# || '%'
upper(A.CNT_NUM ) like '%' || upper(#CNT_NUM# ) || '%'
upper(A.SHT_NUM) like '%' || upper(#SHT_NUM#) || '%'
A.IST_YMD >= #IST_YMD_FROM#
A.IST_YMD <= #IST_YMD_TO#
A.MOP_CDE like #MOP_CDE# || '%'
A.JHT_CDE like #JHT_CDE# || '%'
A.PIP_DIP like #PIP_DIP# || '%'
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

SELECT A.FTR_CDE ,F.FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE, H.HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE ,C.NM AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.SAA_CDE ,C2.NM AS SAA_NAM , A.MOP_CDE ,C3.NM AS MOP_NAM , A.JHT_CDE ,C4.NM AS JHT_NAM , A.LOW_DEP , A.HGH_DEP , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM , A.PIP_LBL , A.PIP_DIP , A.PIP_LEN FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM A LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE F ON A.FTR_CDE = F.FTR_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON C.MST_CD LIKE '250101' AND C.DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H ON H.HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C2 ON C2.DTL_CD LIKE 'SAA%' AND C2.DTL_CD = A.SAA_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C3 ON C3.DTL_CD LIKE 'MOP%' AND C3.MST_CD = '250102' AND C3.DTL_CD = A.MOP_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C4 ON C4.DTL_CD LIKE 'JHT%' AND C4.DTL_CD = A.JHT_CDE WHERE 1=1 AND a.FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND a.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

SELECT A.FTR_CDE ,F.FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE, H.HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE ,C.NM AS MNG_NAM , A.IST_YMD , A.SAA_CDE ,C2.NM AS SAA_NAM , A.MOP_CDE ,C3.NM AS MOP_NAM , A.JHT_CDE ,C4.NM AS JHT_NAM , A.LOW_DEP , A.HGH_DEP , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM , A.PIP_LBL , A.PIP_DIP , A.PIP_LEN FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM A LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE F ON A.FTR_CDE = F.FTR_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C ON C.MST_CD LIKE '250101' AND C.DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA H ON H.HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C2 ON C2.DTL_CD LIKE 'SAA%' AND C2.DTL_CD = A.SAA_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C3 ON C3.DTL_CD LIKE 'MOP%' AND C3.MST_CD = '250102' AND C3.DTL_CD = A.MOP_CDE LEFT JOIN INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO C4 ON C4.DTL_CD LIKE 'JHT%' AND C4.DTL_CD = A.JHT_CDE WHERE 1=1 AND a.FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND a.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
